title:
20h00 - Statutory
provisions.
text:
(a)  
Sec 13(b)(16)
provides an OT exemption for "any employee engaged (a)  
in the transportation
and preparation for transportation of fruits or vegetables, whether or not
performed by the farmer, from the farm to a place of first processing or first
marketing within the same State, or (b) 
in
transportation, whether or not performed by the farmer, between the farm and
any point within the same State of persons employed or to be employed in the
harvesting of fruits or vegetables". (b)  The principles contained in IB
780.900 thru 780.923 explain the application of this exemption.
html:
(a)   Sec 13(b)(16) provides an OT exemption for "any employee engaged

 

(a)   in the transportation and preparation for transportation of fruits or vegetables, whether or not performed by the farmer, from the farm to a place of first processing or first marketing within the same State, or

 

(b)  in transportation, whether or not performed by the farmer, between the farm and any point within the same State of persons employed or to be employed in the harvesting of fruits or vegetables".

 

(b)  The principles contained in IB 780.900 thru 780.923 explain the application of this exemption.
